29 import rospy

41 import sys
42 from os.path import expanduser
43 
44 class RosNodeBase(object):
45  ## Formats a log message
46  # @param type The type of the message. Possibilities: ('e', 'w', 'i'). Others are treated as errors.
47  # @param msg The message to be printed.
48  # @param node_id The name of the node
49  def _formatted_log(self, type, msg, node_id):
50  m = '[{0}] {1}'.format(node_id, msg)
51  if (type == 'i'):
52  rospy.loginfo(m)
53  elif (type == 'w'):
54  rospy.logwarn(m)
55  else:
56  rospy.logerr(m)
57 
58  ## Adds the namespace (node name) to the given string
59  # @param param The ending of the path
60  # @return The path with the namespace added
61  def _ns(self, param):
62  return rospy.get_name() + "/" + param
63 
64  ## Checks the config values from rosparam
65  #
66  # If recommended elements are mising, shows a warning.
67  # If mandatory elements are missing, shows an error end exits the program.
68  # Some params are none of these, they already have default values that are acceptable.
69  def _check_config(self, node_id, mandatory = [], recommended = []):
70  mandatory_missing = False
71  ## True, if some recommended parameters are missing
72  self._recommended_missing = False
73  for attr, value in self.__dict__.iteritems():
74  if attr in mandatory and str(value) == "None":
75  self._formatted_log('e', 'Mandatory config item not set: ' + attr, node_id)
76  mandatory_missing = True
77  elif attr in recommended and str(value) == "None":
78  self._formatted_log('w', 'Recommended config item not set: ' + attr, node_id)
79  self._recommended_missing = True
80  else:
81  self._formatted_log('i', 'Param loaded: ' + attr + ':' + str(value), node_id)
82 
83  if mandatory_missing:
84  self._formatted_log('e', 'Mandatory config item(s) missing, exiting.', node_id)
85  sys.exit()
